cart_clear: Please be advised that in case you leave this section cart will be cleared
scan_instruction:
Set the phone camera to
the QR code on the table
connection_error: Kindly check your connection and try again
use_qr_table_number_label: Use QR Code on your table
empty_cart: Please select items first before proceeding
choose_size: Please Choose meal size first before adding new one
required_data: Please Fill the items data first
restaurant_not_exist:
The restaurant not exist 
 please contact the waiter to get new Code
item_not_exist:
The Product doesn't not exist 
 please contact the waiter
something_wrong:
Something went wrong please restart the application 
if the error still there contact the admin
waiter_coming: Please wait the waiter is coming
camera_denied: Please Grant Camera permission to use the application features
logout_with_active_order_error: Please Close your active order first
save_changes: Please confirm your changes first before proceeding
SERVER_UNREACHABLE: Unable to communicate with server , please try again
EDIT_MUST_BE_SAVED: Please make sure to press save after your edits to be applied
NO_ADDRESSES_MATCH: Delivery service doesn't reach any of your registered addresses please add new one
PHONE_NUMBER_IS_BLOCKED: This Phone number has requested too many messages please try again in while
PRIVATE_FACEBOOK: Your Facebook account is private , Please try again with different account
TWITTER_LOGIN_ERROR: We couldn't find your account please try again with different account , or login method
PAYMENT_FAILED: Something went wrong with transaction , please contact your card provider
SUCCESS_PAYMENT: Your Payment is being processed , Please wait for Waiter confirmation
ONLINE_PAYMENT_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Sorry service currently not available , please try again later
USER_LOGIN_ERROR: An error occurred while logging, please try again later
INVALID_TABLE_NUMBER: Sorry , please request waiter to double check the table number
CHANGE_LANGUAGE_WITH_ACTIVE_ORDER_ERROR: Please Close your active order first
CHANGE_COUNTRY_WITH_ACTIVE_ORDER_ERROR: Please Close your active order first
RESTAURANT_NO_DINE_IN: This feature is not supported for this restaurant
OTHER_ADDRESSES_AVAILABLE: You have other addresses, just not in this restaurant's area.
ADDRESS_ADDED_BUT_NOT_AVAILABLE: Address is added but not available in this restaurant's area.
NO_DELIVERY_REGIONS: This restaurant has no delivery regions
